Quickstrike:




Quickstrike kicked his leg out, when the blade from Apocolype hit 
him. He went numb, passing out, going into stasis lock.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  The horsmen except for death cuz he is off ona mission ran to 
drillbit's 
> aid. Sphink also appeared in the sound of fire. He knew of Kit 
Kat's death 
> and of course sided with her sucsessor. Sphink injected drill bit 
in the arm 
> with some healing fluid. "This will counter the venom that entered 
your 
> system. Now let apocalypse finish him off. Quick strike is no match 
for him 
> in his present state. They watched as apocalypse's blade came down 
and waited 
> to see what happened.
